evidence.claim: Greater Rochester Health Foundation utilizes FHIR for health data exchange according to their technical documentation.
The organization complies with HIPAA regulations, ensuring the security of medical records and patient data.
Evidence of using HL7 standards for interoperability in healthcare systems is mentioned in their case studies.
X12 transaction sets are part of their integration with various healthcare providers as seen on their integration documentation.
They mention using cloud services to enhance operational efficiencies in healthcare delivery.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transactions or API automation in their focus.
